phrases: Grand Elder- san's place is just ahead!
l might have said that once we have the Grand Elder draw out Gohan's dormant power,
he would rival Vegeta, but to be honest, l doubt we can expect that much.
That bastard really does have a gift.
There is no end to how strong he is becoming.
After having Gohan made stronger, all we can do is wait for Goku to get here,
and then have all three of us fight together.
I am hardly tired at all!
Now then, all right, that is all for my training.
With the time that is left, I will rest up.
I have to get used to regular gravity again, too.
I am so light, it feels like I are not even here!
So light, so light, so light, I say!
After building myself up this much, I am sure I will be able to withstand a 10X Kaio-ken!
I am almost to Planet Namek, huh?
All right, let us do this!
Now, all that is left is to sleep tight.
But let us take a moment before doing that.
Let us see... here it is.
This stuff is bitter, after all.
Let us see... here it is, here it is, this, this!
Goku had not realized that at some point along the way,
he had obtained a level of power that went beyond Saiyan limits.
Gohan, it is coming into view!
You see that tall mountain there?
All right, we are in the home stretch!
G- Gohan, there is a Ki!
There is a Ki coming from behind us!
I- it could not be... Vegeta!
Gohan, I will use all of my strength to stop him here.
You go on to Grand Elder- san's place!
In any case, I have to try.
I- I am impressed that you discovered us.
I am in a completely different league than you are.
Now, why do not you return to me the Dragon Ball with the four stars that I had hidden?
You have made a mockery of me!
W- what in the world are you talking about?
I will make you talk soon enough.
That mountain where Kakarrot's son fled to...
That is where you have hidden the ball, is it?
You have a tremendous amount of dormant power, do not you?
Excuse me, but could I ask you to hurry?
Looks like you want to die.
All right, today's the day when we settle things!
What did you do in there!?
Why has your base power risen so sharply!?
your battle power seems to have risen to a level incomparable to what it was before.
There is a large, mysterious power approaching Namek.
L- listen, Grand Elder- sama says that there is something approaching this world!
There really is something up there!
I- it is an incredible power!
It does not feel like there is just one...
Freeza has called in the Ginyu Special Corps!
You guys, hand over your Dragon Ball to me, now!
I promise you, once I gain the power of immortality,
in no way will I do anything to you!
Hurry, or there will be no undoing what will happen!
Y- you think you can fool us!?
If we do that, we will be playing right into your hands!
Listen to me closely, you dirty bastards!
This Ginyu Special Corps that Freeza has called in has five men,
each of which is as strong as me- no, probably even stronger!
They are going to use the latest Scouters to find me,
as well as you guys, and then come kill us at once!
There is only one path we can take!
The only route we have is to make me immortal, and have me defeat them!
What he is saying might be true.
There are indeed five great evil powers out there.
Well, let us make Gohan immortal!
He might have the power, but he is utterly lacking in tactical experience!
B- but then... if that is the case... why the hell did we even come here!?
The Dragon Balls can grant you three wishes.
You guys will be sure to have your wish granted.
Why do you keep repeating it!?
Who knows if there is going to be enough time!?
L- listen, we really... we really can have three wishes granted, right?
But we are going to make sure you keep your promise, you got that!?
Fly as fast as you can!
It looks like they have left, huh?
But even if it works out, their chances of winning are extremely low.
You want to help out some, do not you?
If it is about me, I will be all right.
My life should still hold out for a little while.
So, you have arrived at last, Ginyu Special Corps.
I have been waiting for you.
Why does this have to happen to me?
W- what in the world was that!?
Bulma- san, I am taking the Dragon Ball with me.
H- hey, what exactly is going on!?
Explain what is happening before you go!
Do you know the kind of trouble I have had to go through!?
Really, when it comes to those guys, I have just about-
Was not that Vegeta with them just now?
I- I have been expecting you.
The tense situation was starting to change rapidly.
Who exactly are the Ginyu Special Corps, whom even Vegeta is afraid of?
To whom will go the Dragon Balls, along with their wishes?
